questions.quote: Okay. I'm gonna check my machine first.  Picking someone up at the airport, jury duty, waiting for cable guy...
Oh, the cameras was, vrooom, there. The announcers, they made a couple of cracks about you.
Well, that's okay.  We'll make this next right, and swing around to get back to the dealership.
So, yeah, that's funny. Hey, you wanna hear something weird? Mr. Pitt eats his Snickers bars with a knife and fork.
You should be the one criticizing me. I, I'm lucky to even know someone like you.
Of course Zach and I have been dating. What'd you think, I was the office skank?
What ever happened to "Why, that's a lovely dress you have on. May I have this dance?"!!
Why do I always pay? What am I made of money? You bunch of deadbeats.
No. No it's not. You don't know this guy. It woulda been so sweet.
Stop it, George! Get out! Get out! I never want to see you again!
